医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
生活方式的改变可以降低患阿尔茨海默病的风险吗？在 20 周的时间内，强烈的生活方式改变可显着改善因阿尔茨海默病导致的轻度认知障碍或早期痴呆患者的认知和功能，这显示出非药物干预的良好效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Can-lifestyles-changes-reduce-Alzheimere28099s-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Can-lifestyles-changes-reduce-Alzheimere28099s-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5120b55-e04f-43e1-ae5f-d6c60efec2d5 Mon, 10 Jun 2024 20:50:00 -0400 Can lifestyles changes reduce Alzheimer’s risk?
精准引导治疗可提高高危癌症儿童的治疗效果研究表明，精准引导治疗 (PGT) 可改善高危儿科癌症患者的预后，但由于医生的不确定性和缺乏长期生存数据，临床采用率仍然较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Precision-guided-treatment-boosts-outcomes-in-children-with-high-risk-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Precision-guided-treatment-boosts-outcomes-in-children-with-high-risk-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c30262f-ebf0-4c9c-8504-159feab4896f Mon, 10 Jun 2024 20:12:00 -0400 Precision-guided treatment boosts outcomes in children with high-risk cancers
颗粒测量系统和制药集成推出 BioCapt® 一次性 AutoM 微生物冲击器，用于自动微生物空气采样污染监测领域的全球领导者 ParticlemeasurementSystems (PMS) 和专门为下一代注射药物小容量灌装整理提供创新机器人解决方案的 PharmaIntegration 公司自豪地宣布推出 BioCapt 一次性 AutoM微生物冲击器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Particle-Measuring-Systems-and-Pharma-Integration-Introduce-the-BioCaptc2ae-Single-Use-AutoM-Microbial-Impactor-for-Automated-Microbial-空气采样.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Particle-Measuring-Systems-and-Pharma-Integration-Introduce-the-BioCaptc2ae-Single-Use-AutoM-Microbial-Impactor-for-Automated-Microbial-空气采样.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c90b5ca9-2952-4f05-a77f-1eb12c1b8793 Mon, 10 Jun 2024 11:23:00 -0400 Particle Measuring Systems and Pharma Integration Introduce the BioCapt® Single-Use AutoM Microbial Impactor for Automated Microbial Air Sampling
宿主RNA掺入与慢性戊型肝炎感染相关如果病毒将宿主遗传片段整合到其基因组中，感染可能会变成慢性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Host-RNA-incorporation-linked-to-chronic-hepatitis-E-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Host-RNA-incorporation-linked-to-chronic-hepatitis-E-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0db0b5bd-5d62-4734-97d2-84fc2d2ea93b Mon, 10 Jun 2024 07:14:59 -0400 Host RNA incorporation linked to chronic hepatitis E infection
主动脉血流异常与血管壁炎症和破裂有关主动脉血流异常与主动脉扩张时血管壁的炎症和破裂有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Abnormal-aortic-blood-in-the-aorta-flow-linked-to-vessel-wall-inflammation-and-breakdown.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Abnormal-aortic-blood-in-the-aorta-flow-linked-to-vessel-wall-inflammation-and-breakdown.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8894672-7d18-448e-92d4-9f3a65613bcc Mon, 10 Jun 2024 07:01:54 -0400 Abnormal aortic blood in the aorta flow linked to vessel wall inflammation and breakdown
专家建议采用更综合的方法来治疗饮食失调患者一位专家表示，卫生服务部门应该向饮食失调患者传授社会心理技能，以帮助更多的人康复并避免复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Expert-suggests-a-more-integrated-approach-to-treating-people-with-eating-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Expert-suggests-a-more-integrated-approach-to-treating-people-with-eating-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7659e008-6a20-4c40-b3cd-8537703d1963 Mon, 10 Jun 2024 06:50:43 -0400 Expert suggests a more integrated approach to treating people with eating disorders
青少年早期的社交焦虑与后来的自杀念头和抑郁有关一项新的研究表明，经历过较高水平社交焦虑症状的青少年更有可能在两年后报告自杀念头和其他抑郁症状的增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Early-social-anxiety-in-adolescents-linked-to-later-suicidal-thoughts-and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Early-social-anxiety-in-adolescents-linked-to-later-suicidal-thoughts-and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c67f3fad-70de-4e80-af7c-60e2699b069d Mon, 10 Jun 2024 06:32:26 -0400 Early social anxiety in adolescents linked to later suicidal thoughts and depression
新的大脑连接模型可在诊断前数年预测痴呆症默认模式网络（DMN）的有效连接是否可以在个体层面预测未来的痴呆症诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/New-brain-connectivity-model-predicts-dementia-years-before-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/New-brain-connectivity-model-predicts-dementia-years-before-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30b910b8-770c-473e-b5f9-d79ac341a5c2 Mon, 10 Jun 2024 06:27:00 -0400 New brain connectivity model predicts dementia years before diagnosis
夜间运动对超重和肥胖成年人降低血糖水平最有效根据肥胖协会 (TOS) 旗舰期刊《肥胖》(Obesity) 上发表的一项研究，新研究表明，对于超重和肥胖的久坐成年人来说，晚上进行中度至剧烈的体力活动对于降低每日血糖水平最有益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Evening-exercise-most- effective-in-reducing-blood-sugar-levels-for-overweight-and-obese-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Evening-exercise-most- effective-in-reducing-blood-sugar-levels-for-overweight-and-obese-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cc7dc71-effd-41b2-903a-af11ae5cdb70 Mon, 10 Jun 2024 06:16:00 -0400 Evening exercise most effective in reducing blood sugar levels for overweight and obese adults
肺癌筛查可以实现早期诊断并提高退伍军人的治愈率在通过退伍军人健康管理局医疗系统诊断出患有肺癌的美国退伍军人中，那些在诊断前接受筛查的人比未接受筛查的人更有可能被诊断为早期疾病，并且治愈率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Lung-cancer-screening-yields-early-diagnoses-and-increased-cure-rates-in-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Lung-cancer-screening-yields-early-diagnoses-and-increased-cure-rates-in-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e87e3067-f862-4a93-9260-85ca4eab870e Mon, 10 Jun 2024 06:12:09 -0400 Lung cancer screening yields early diagnoses and increased cure rates in veterans
